org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing.mxml

Class BaseRawMXMLTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing.mxml.BaseRawMXMLTokenizer

  • public abstract class BaseRawMXMLTokenizer
extends Object
    Base class for JFlex-based tokenizers (RawScriptTokenizer, RawTagTokenizer, RawCSSTokenizer, RawMetadataTokenizer). Tokenizers should use %extends BaseRawTokenizer and provide a definitino for getColumn(). yytext()) will be generated automatically.

    • Method Detail

      • yytext

        public abstract String yytext()
        Gets the text of the current token. This is implemented by JFlex.
        Returns:
        The text of current token

      • getOffset

        public abstract int getOffset()
        Gets the current offset of the tokenizer into the file buffer. This should be implemented in the grammar file by returning JFlex's zzchar.
        Returns:
        The current offset.

      • getLine

        public abstract int getLine()
        Gets the current line number of the tokenizer. Line numbers start at 1, not 0. This should be implemented in the grammar file by returning JFlex's zzline.
        Returns:
        The current line.

      • getColumn

        public abstract int getColumn()
        Gets the current column number of the tokenizer. Column numbers start at 1, not 0. This should be implemented in the grammar file by returning JFlex's zzcolumn.
        Returns:
        The current column.

      • buildToken

        protected antlr.Token buildToken(int type,
                     int start,
                     int end,
                     int line,
                     int column,
                     String text)

      • buildToken

        protected antlr.Token buildToken(int type,
                     String text)
        Builds a token with the specified type and text, using the current getOffset(), getLine(), and getColumn(). The grammar file should not override this.
        Parameters:
        type - token type (based on the appropriate XxxTokenTypes interface)
        Returns:
        new token

      • buildToken

        protected antlr.Token buildToken(int type)
        Build a token of the specified type, using the current yytext(), getOffset(), getLine(), and getColumn(). The grammar file cannot override this.
        Parameters:
        type - token type (based on the appropriate XxxTokenTypes interface)
        Returns:
        new token
